00021 /*! \file DataSetUpdater.h Provides interfaces to update data in a "Calvin" binary data file. */
00022 
00023 #ifndef _DataSetUpdater_HEADER_
00024 #define _DataSetUpdater_HEADER_
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/portability/src/AffymetrixBaseTypes.h"
00027 //
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 //
00033 
00034 namespace affymetrix_calvin_io
00035 {
00036 
00037 /*! Provides interfaces to update data in a "Calvin" binary data file.
00038  * This class assumes that the file has been completely written and that
00039  * only existing data groups/sets/rows/cols are being modified.
00040  */
00041 class DataSetUpdater
00042 {
00043 protected:
00044         /*! The name of the file being updated. */
00045         std::string fileName;
00046 
00047         /*! The position of a data set for all data sets in the file. */
00048         std::vector<std::vector<int> > positions;
00049 
00050         /*! The size of a row for all data sets in the file. */
00051         std::vector<std::vector<int> > rowsizes;
00052 
00053         /*! The size of a column for all data sets in the file. */
00054         std::vector<std::vector<std::vector<int> > > colsizes;
00055 
00056     /*! The data set names. */
00057     std::vector<std::vector<std::wstring> > dataSetNames; 
00058 
00059         /*! Seek to the position of the data.
00060          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00061          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00062          * @param row The index to the rows.
00063          * @param col The index to the columns.
00064          */
00065         void SeekToPosition(std::ofstream &os, int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col);
00066 
00067 public:
00068         /*! Constructor */
00069         DataSetUpdater();
00070 
00071         /*! Destructor */
00072         ~DataSetUpdater();
00073 
00074         /*! Initialize the class given a "calvin" data file.
00075          * @param file The name of the file.
00076          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException The file does not exist.
00077          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00078          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00079          */
00080         virtual void Initialize(const char *file);
00081 
00082         /*! Updates a string value in the data set
00083          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00084          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00085          * @param row The index to the rows.
00086          * @param col The index to the columns.
00087          * @param value The new value.
00088          */
00089         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, const std::string &value);
00090 
00091         /*! Updates a wstring value in the data set
00092          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00093          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00094          * @param row The index to the rows.
00095          * @param col The index to the columns.
00096          * @param value The new value.
00097          */
00098         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, const std::wstring &value);
00099 
00100         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00101          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00102          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00103          * @param row The index to the rows.
00104          * @param col The index to the columns.
00105          * @param value The new value.
00106          */
00107         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, int8_t value);
00108 
00109         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00110          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00111          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00112          * @param row The index to the rows.
00113          * @param col The index to the columns.
00114          * @param value The new value.
00115          */
00116         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, int16_t value);
00117 
00118         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00119          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00120          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00121          * @param row The index to the rows.
00122          * @param col The index to the columns.
00123          * @param value The new value.
00124          */
00125         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, int32_t value);
00126 
00127         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00128          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00129          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00130          * @param row The index to the rows.
00131          * @param col The index to the columns.
00132          * @param value The new value.
00133          */
00134         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, u_int8_t value);
00135 
00136         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00137          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00138          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00139          * @param row The index to the rows.
00140          * @param col The index to the columns.
00141          * @param value The new value.
00142          */
00143         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, u_int16_t value);
00144 
00145         /*! Updates an integer value in the data set
00146          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00147          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00148          * @param row The index to the rows.
00149          * @param col The index to the columns.
00150          * @param value The new value.
00151          */
00152         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, u_int32_t value);
00153 
00154         /*! Updates a floating point value in the data set
00155          * @param groupIndex The index to the data groups.
00156          * @param setIndex The index to the data sets.
00157          * @param row The index to the rows.
00158          * @param col The index to the columns.
00159          * @param value The new value.
00160          */
00161         void Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, float value);
00162 };
00163 
00164 }
